name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: mindful - stay focused on your goals

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay present, focused, and intentional each day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
mindful is the ultimate focus-enhancing extension that streamlines your daily productivity and keeps you on track. With mindful, users can:

Stay focused throughout their day: mindful displays your tasks on every new tab, ensuring that they stay top-of-mind.

Remember your intentions: mindful reminds you of the your intentions on every new tab.

Block distracting websites: mindful site-blocking feature intercepts when you visit a distracting website and redirects you back to your tasks, keeping you on course.

Install mindful today and experience a better, more focused, and productive day.
